mapper.update:
update oss_daily_DailyBalance
DarlyankStock = #{darlyankstock,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DeliveryNo = #{deliveryno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ReceiveL = #{receivel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TodayOut = #{todayout,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TodayStock = #{todaystock,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RealStock = #{realstock,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Loss = #{loss,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LossSent = #{losssent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUCode = #{oucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where AccountDate = #{accountdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and NodeNo = #{nodeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oss_daily_DailyBalance set DarlyankStock = #{darlyankstock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DeliveryNo = #{deliveryno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReceiveL = #{receivel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TodayOut = #{todayout,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TodayStock = #{todaystock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RealStock = #{realstock,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Loss = #{loss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LossSent = #{losssent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUCode = #{oucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where AccountDate = #{accountdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and NodeNo = #{nodeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM oss_daily_DailyBalance WHERE AccountDate>=#{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} And AccountDate<#{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OUCode LIKE #{oucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM oss_daily_DailyBalance WHERE AccountDate>=#{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} And AccountDate<#{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and OUCode LIKE #{oucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
